title: Pot hole near Gandhi Hospital Road number 20, 5000 098
description: A large pothole has formed near Gandhi Hospital on Road Number 20, postal code 5000 098, posing a hazard to drivers and pedestrians.

title: Solar-Powered Streetlights for Energy Efficiency
description: Implementing solar-powered streetlights can enhance energy efficiency and reduce electricity costs in urban areas.

title: Traffic Lights Broken at RJ Crossroad
description: The traffic lights at RJ Crossroad are malfunctioning, leading to traffic congestion and potential safety hazards.

title: Rainwater Harvesting Systems for Public Buildings
description: Installing rainwater harvesting systems in public buildings can conserve water and promote sustainable water management practices.

title: Need for Pedestrian Bridge over Busy Highway
description: A pedestrian bridge is urgently needed over the busy highway to ensure the safety of people crossing and reduce traffic accidents.
